text: We will hear arguments first this morning in Secretary of the Interior against California and others, and the consolidated cases.
Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court:
Chief Justice Burger, and may it please the Court:
Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court:

I would like to call to the Court's attention, Chief Justice Burger, a public document clearly subject to judicial notice, which I think may be of help to the Court, staff recommendation to the California Coastal Commission, File No.
I certainly do, Your Honor, and I thank you for giving me that opportunity.
